name: Car Crash Beam Drive Accidents
description:
Are you ready to take the adventure of car crash bean drive challenge? It's time to demolish traffic rules on city highways in realistic mode. Enjoy High Speed Car Crash Accidents on city highways and bumpy roads of offroad in this beam drive accident simulator 2018.

Tighten your seat belt and enjoy loads of stunts while climbing heights ramps arena. Jump into your muscle car, drive safely on curvy and dangerous insane tracks. Be careful while racing the cars to avoid falling. Enjoy having car driving with heavy smoke that are coming out from the vehicle.But avoid dangerous obstacles or you’re toasted.Try to engage yourself in crash incidents and destroy vehicles with direct hitting in this car crash simulator. Try this new Car Crash realistic Mustang GT stunt game with extreme car racing environment.

Features:
-Enjoy high speed arena.
-Real crash with 3d camera angle
-Learn extreme driving learning skills.
